column4: xawtv4 is required for ivtv according to xawtv's home page. Ubuntu xawtv 3.9.x will not work
i think its the other way around. ivtv are the drivers
try compiling from source. perhaps they made two different builds for edgy and fiesty or whatever you used to use. i take it you're using a digitial card then
have you tried other ways to verify the drivers are working/not working?
